children.text: Grab a quick breakfast or lunch on the main floor of the Attitash Lodge. Enjoy great views of the mountain with cafeteria-style dining.
Brats and Brews is a walk up service bar serving indoors or at the deck side window. Featuring craft beer, Canned cocktails, brats, hot dogs, chili and soft jumbo pretzels!
Burgers, chicken, pizza, chili, soup, Mac & Cheese, sandwiches, salads and more. Also features German-style fare Fri-Sun and holidays.
Soak up the sun on the patio. Full-service restaurant & bar in the Bear Peak Base Lodge. Great apps, signature sandwiches, and drinks..
Chicken, pizza , Grab-n-Go salads, sandwiches and snacks. Serving breakfast, lunch, beer, wine and cocktails in the Adventure Center.
Enjoy lunch, appetizers, sandwiches, a full bar, and craft beers on tap. Local après entertainment on Saturdays during the season.
Mexican food goodness, paired with a margarita or a cold draft beer - that's the Cantina. Serving tacos, salad, chips & salsa.
Pastries in the morning and BBQ at lunch. The perfect options for before and after your family lessons. Open Fri-Sun and holidays.
